name: ERIE FAMILY HEALTH CENTERS

Medicaid Community health center funding 340B Drug Pricing Program National Health Service Corps Teaching Health Center GME Program Title VIII Advance Nursing Education Programs Title VIII Nursing Wor
Requested to maintain access to all service area residents in the community health center program. Requested support of the Title VIII Nursing Workforce Reauthorization (S1874/HR3593).

Protection of Medicaid program. Extension of Medicare telehealth flexibilities. Requested support of CONNECT for Health Act of 2025 (S.1261/H.R.4206). Requested support of The Telehealth Modernization
